detail_desc: Cap with an appliqué on the front and concealed elastication at the back.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft fleece with a zip at the front that continues down one leg and has a chin guard. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a collar, button placket and prominent, gathered shoulder seams. Gathered yoke with sharp angles at the back, a detachable tie belt at the waist, long sleeves and wide cuffs with two buttons.
Short dress in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication. Tier on the skirt for added width.
Fitted, knee-length dress in a soft, rib-knit wool and cashmere blend with a deep V-neck front and back and long, wide sleeves that taper at the cuffs.
Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in a crêpe weave with elastication and a frill trim at the top and 3/4-length sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details. Regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs with frayed, raw-edge hems.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Sports trousers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a zipped leg pocket. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Elastic hairband with decorative fabric flowers.
Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist and contrasting colour print motifs.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hook and eyes.
Jumper knitted in a soft mohair blend with wide ribbing around the neckline , low dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Padded sleep mask with an elastic strap at the back. Polyester lining.

Cardigan in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a V-neck, buttons down the front and front pockets. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Two-button jacket in a cotton Oxford weave with a chest pocket, flap front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets, a decorative button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim legs.
Long cardigan in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in a softly draping weave with a V-neck opening at the front and an opening at the back with a button at the back of the neck. Detachable tie belt at the waist and wide, ankle-length legs.

Set in cotton jersey with a long-sleeved dress, pair of leggings and a hairband. Dress with a gathered seam and broderie anglaise at the top and a press-stud on one shoulder. Leggings with an elasticated waist. Hairband with a bow at the front.
Calf-length skirt in a crêpe weave with a sheen. Twisted decorative seams front and back and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Fully lined bikini. Top with narrow shoulder straps and flounces at the front. Bottoms with a flounce at the waist.
Calf-length, A-line skirt in washed cotton denim with a soft finish. High waist, zip fly and button, a coin pocket, front and back pockets, and a raw-edge hem.
Thong body in soft cotton jersey with crossover straps at the front, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, high-cut legs, a lined gusset and a string back.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend in various colours and designs.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft fabric. Top with a motif on the front, press-studs on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and ribbed hems.

Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, lightly padded, scallop-trimmed cups. Detachable shoulder straps that tie at the neck and an adjustable metal fastener at the back. Side support and a silicone trim.
Short, stretchy skirt in jacquard-patterned jersey with a wide waist panel for best fit over the tummy, and a short slit at the back of the hem. Unlined.
Narrow waist belt in imitation leather with a round metal buckle decorated with sparkly stones. Width 2 cm.

Short dress in airy, crinkled, patterned chiffon with a rounded collar and button placket. Pin-tucks and frills at the front and long sleeves with frill trims at the shoulders and cuffs. Seam at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and a gently flared, lined skirt.
Long-sleeved tops in sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Push-up bras in soft cotton jersey with lace. Underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back.
Top in sturdy jersey with a round neckline that has a small opening and button at the back of the neck, 3/4-length sleeves, flared cuffs with a pleat, and a straight-cut hem.

Shorts in soft cotton jersey with detachable, elastic braces. Elasticated waist with a decorative button, a fake fly, side pockets, a fake pocket with a button front and back, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

5-pocket, ankle-length trousers in imitation leather with an extended waistband and concealed button. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, zip fly and concealed hooks and eyes. Straight legs in a slightly looser fit with seams at the knees.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Joggers in sturdy sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and a fake back pocket. Tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Flip-flops with rubber straps and fluted rubber soles.
Vest top in airy jersey with a print motif and rounded hem.
Short-sleeved T-shirt in stretch cotton jersey. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s natural physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs.

Jacket in woven fabric with a concealed two-way zip down the front and a lined stand-up collar with fasteners. Long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs, flap side pockets with a button, and a ribbed hem. Lined.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric. Slightly longer at the back.
Short satin nightslip with lace at the top, a V-neck and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps.
Sleeveless tops in an airy cotton weave with a small opening at the back and shimmering button at the back of the neck. Seam and a wide flounce at the hem.
Shirt in a soft weave with a grandad collar, decorative chest pocket with a button and long sleeves with a tab and button and buttoned cuffs. Gently rounded hem.
Trousers in sturdy, patterned cotton canvas with a zip fly, patch front pockets and fake flap pockets at the back.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist.
Long-sleeved dress in soft fine-knit cotton with a round neck and frills at the front. Buttons at the back of the neck and a seam with a gently flared skirt at the bottom.
Top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a print motif and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Cold shoulder blouse in an airy weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a frill trim at the top. Long sleeves with smocking and a narrow frill at the cuffs, a seam with a drawstring at the waist, inset ladder stitching and a scalloped lace trim at the hem.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing some wool.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves, a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of joggers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder, chest pocket with a print motif and appliqués, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Patterned joggers with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight legs.
Short, straight dress in crinkled chiffon with an opening with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the back of the neck and long sleeves with a double flounce at the cuffs. Lined.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey with press-studs down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Short plastic necklaces. One elastic necklace with a glittery pendant and one adjustable-length glittery necklace.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Cycling shorts in stretch cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Double-layered hairbands in soft jersey with a sewn-on bow.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waistband, side pockets and rounded hems. Contrasting colour stripes and trims at the sides and hems.
Open poncho in an airy viscose weave with inset lace embroidery, a drawstring at the waist and slits in the sides.
Lightweight nylon coat with a filling of 70% recycled down and 30% recycled feathers. Front pockets and a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Lined.
Jumper in a soft, textured cashmere knit with a V-neck and dropped shoulders.
Short dress in woven fabric with a V-shaped opening at the front, buttons down the front, a gathered yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Pool shoes with a padded foot strap and moulded soles that are fluted underneath.
Leather sandals with imitation cork soles, straps with a hook and loop fastening over the foot and moulded thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Backpack in woven fabric with imitation leather details, a handle and drawstring at the top and a flap with a concealed pocket and tabs with a magnetic fastener. Padded, adjustable shoulder straps, an outer compartment with a flap and magnetic fastener, and a padded laptop compartment. Padded backplate and base. Size approx. 16x29.5x45 cm.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey with short puff sleeves, short legs and press-studs down the front and along one leg.
